nodes.text: After taking control of the planet of Kubindi, the Galactic Empire blockaded the world and enslaved its population. The Kubaz spy Garindan ezz Zavor sought to liberate his homeworld, so he purchased Imperial codes to get through the blockade and worked to get enough credits to hire a starship. He also had the intelligence necessary to build weaponry that could blast Imperial TIE fighters out of the sky.
